code:
flowchart TD
    subgraph "System Access"
        UserLogin[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
        NavigateIoT[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        LoadIoTDashboard[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    end

    subgraph "System Overview"
        ViewSystemHealth[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        CheckConnectivity[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        MonitorDataFlow[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        ReviewBackupStatus[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
    end

    subgraph "Device Monitoring"
        SelectDeviceCategory[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        ViewDeviceList[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
        ExamineDevice[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
        CheckDeviceStatus[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
    end

    subgraph "Device Management"
        DeviceStatus{HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine}
        OnlineDevices[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        OfflineDevices[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        WarningDevices[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
    end

    subgraph "Data Analysis"
        ViewSensorData[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
        AnalyzeTrends[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        SetThresholds[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        ConfigureMonitoring[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
    end

    subgraph "Alert Management"
        ReviewSystemAlerts[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
        AlertType{HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine}
        ErrorAlerts[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        WarningAlerts[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
        InfoAlerts[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    end

    subgraph "Device Control"
        ControlActions{HealthTech_LabAnalyzer}
        ReconnectDevices[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        ResetDevices[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        UpdateFirmware[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        CalibrateSensors[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    end

    subgraph "Maintenance Operations"
        ScheduleMaintenance[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        PerformDiagnostics[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
        UpdateConfigurations[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        DocumentChanges[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
    end

    subgraph "Network Management"
        MonitorNetwork[HealthTech_PatientRecords]
        OptimizeConnectivity[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        ManageBandwidth[HealthTech_EMR_Sync]
        SecurityUpdates[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
    end

    subgraph "Reporting & Analytics"
        GenerateDeviceReports[HealthTech_DiagnosticEngine]
        AnalyzeEfficiency[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
        PredictFailures[HealthTech_HIPAA_Vault]
        OptimizeDeployment[HealthTech_LabAnalyzer]
    end

    UserLogin --> NavigateIoT
    NavigateIoT --> LoadIoTDashboard
    LoadIoTDashboard --> ViewSystemHealth

    ViewSystemHealth --> CheckConnectivity
    CheckConnectivity --> MonitorDataFlow
    MonitorDataFlow --> ReviewBackupStatus

    ViewSystemHealth --> SelectDeviceCategory
    SelectDeviceCategory --> ViewDeviceList
    ViewDeviceList --> ExamineDevice
    ExamineDevice --> CheckDeviceStatus
    CheckDeviceStatus --> DeviceStatus

    DeviceStatus -->|Online| OnlineDevices
    DeviceStatus -->|Offline| OfflineDevices
    DeviceStatus -->|Warning| WarningDevices

    ExamineDevice --> ViewSensorData
    ViewSensorData --> AnalyzeTrends
    AnalyzeTrends --> SetThresholds
    SetThresholds --> ConfigureMonitoring

    ViewSystemHealth --> ReviewSystemAlerts
    ReviewSystemAlerts --> AlertType

    AlertType -->|Error| ErrorAlerts
    AlertType -->|Warning| WarningAlerts
    AlertType -->|Info| InfoAlerts

    ErrorAlerts --> ControlActions
    WarningAlerts --> ControlActions
    OfflineDevices --> ControlActions

    ControlActions -->|Reconnect| ReconnectDevices
    ControlActions -->|Reset| ResetDevices
    ControlActions -->|Update| UpdateFirmware
    ControlActions -->|Calibrate| CalibrateSensors

    ExamineDevice --> ScheduleMaintenance
    ScheduleMaintenance --> PerformDiagnostics
    PerformDiagnostics --> UpdateConfigurations
    UpdateConfigurations --> DocumentChanges

    ViewSystemHealth --> MonitorNetwork
    MonitorNetwork --> OptimizeConnectivity
    OptimizeConnectivity --> ManageBandwidth
    ManageBandwidth --> SecurityUpdates

    ViewSystemHealth --> GenerateDeviceReports
    GenerateDeviceReports --> AnalyzeEfficiency
    AnalyzeEfficiency --> PredictFailures
    PredictFailures --> OptimizeDeployment

    classDef access fill:#e3f2fd,stroke:#1976d2
    classDef overview fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#7b1fa2
    classDef monitoring fill:#e8f5e8,stroke:#388e3c
    classDef management fill:#fff3e0,stroke:#f57c00
    classDef analysis fill:#fce4ec,stroke:#c2185b
    classDef alerts fill:#e1f5fe,stroke:#0277bd
    classDef control fill:#f1f8e9,stroke:#689f38
    classDef maintenance fill:#e8eaf6,stroke:#3f51b5
    classDef network fill:#fce4ec,stroke:#e91e63
    classDef reporting fill:#f3e5f5,stroke:#9c27b0

    class UserLogin,NavigateIoT,LoadIoTDashboard access
    class ViewSystemHealth,CheckConnectivity,MonitorDataFlow,ReviewBackupStatus overview
    class SelectDeviceCategory,ViewDeviceList,ExamineDevice,CheckDeviceStatus monitoring
    class DeviceStatus,OnlineDevices,OfflineDevices,WarningDevices management
    class ViewSensorData,AnalyzeTrends,SetThresholds,ConfigureMonitoring analysis
    class ReviewSystemAlerts,AlertType,ErrorAlerts,WarningAlerts,InfoAlerts alerts
    class ControlActions,ReconnectDevices,ResetDevices,UpdateFirmware,CalibrateSensors control
    class ScheduleMaintenance,PerformDiagnostics,UpdateConfigurations,DocumentChanges maintenance
    class MonitorNetwork,OptimizeConnectivity,ManageBandwidth,SecurityUpdates network
    class GenerateDeviceReports,AnalyzeEfficiency,PredictFailures,OptimizeDeployment reporting
repo_description: The Space Waste Management System (SWMS) is a comprehensive web-based platform designed for managing waste recovery, fabrication, inventory, and IoT systems in space station environments.
